title: How to analyze the speech of Maria Corazon 'Coty' - Quora

response.answer_text: I have no idea. I’ve never heard of her and would need to Google her speech and context to be able to start. I am assuming that you must be familiar with both speech and context to be given that question. I am happy to Google both speech and context so that I can see if I agree with your analysis once you have done it. Then I will tell you if I agree or disagree and help you with any grammar and punctuation problems.
